review: At first I love it, now I hate it
The bread is amazing, it's always fresh and delicious!
I love the croissants, they're so flaky and buttery!
The pastries are a bit too sweet for my taste, but still good.
review_ST: pastries bit sweet taste  still good

review: The sandwiches are great, I love the variety of fillings.
I'm not a fan of the bread, it's too dense for my liking.
The cakes are beautiful and tasty, perfect for special occasions.
review_ST: cakes beautiful tasty  perfect special occasions

review: The service is friendly and fast, I always enjoy coming here.
review_ST: service friendly fast  always enjoy coming

review: The prices are a bit high, but the quality is worth it.
I've had some issues with consistency in the past, but overall it's a good bakery.
review_ST: issues consistency past  overall good bakery

review: The bread is always fresh, but I wish they had more gluten-free options.
